mapper.insert: insert into notion (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from notion where no = #{no}
mapper.update: update notion set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select title, no, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from notion where no > 0 order by no desc, regdate desc
